titleStmt.title: A most worthy speech spoken in the honourable House of Commons by Sir Beniamin Rvdyard, desiring a happy union betweene the King and his Parliament without effusion of bloud, this present July 9th, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N. Allen and are to be sold in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of original in Huntington Library (reel 800:10) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2984:8).
